title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE21004 3 - 0 - 0: 3 CreditsBasic equations, Airy s stress function, two-dimensional problems; Strain measurement methods, strain gages, gage sensitivity and gage factor, demonstration of measurement techniques. Two dimensional photo-elasticity; wave theory, polariscopes, isochromatic
